Text:
Seriously, now, is this one of those jehovah's witness/LDS/missionary things that you HAVE to disseminate to earn god's brownie points?  

I say this because this makes seventeen torrents currently alive for "Bible Atlas".

Thats almost as many as the 50 Shades or Hunger Games trilogies.

Please, give the internet a break and free up some bandwidth. Some of us are trying to download some new porn.
